item.description:
Monica has graciously offered to hostess us at her home for the evening, with cozy fireplace, comfy couches and snuggly puppy. We will give address/direction information to those coming (not going to post for all to see).

So THANK YOU Monica for your generous offer to this group again. Lets all help out and let Monica know what you can bring. In trying to come up with a theme for the party we suggested since the Patriots are once again headed to the Superbowl that we would have a Patriots Superbowl Kickoff theme. So feel free to where your Patriots gear (or your cheerleading outfits ) and bring along some food/drink and enjoy the company and conversation of other divorc(ed)(ing) people. And yes Giants fans are welcome too.

Please post a comment on the event with what you can bring.

We still need people to sign up to bring items: (suggestions)
Bottled Water
Soft Drinks
Appetizer
Desserts
Salad
Fruit/vegetable platter
item.how_to_find_us: The address will be sent to all members that reply yes.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Natick Social Event
